title: Danny & Jillian Bell (Brittany Runs A Marathon) Fall Into A Nostalgia Spiral
itunes:title: Danny & Jillian Bell (Brittany Runs A Marathon) Fall Into A Nostalgia Spiral
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Jillian Bell (star of Brittany Runs A Marathon, 22 Jump Street, Workaholics, and more) to Everything Iconic. They talk about her amazing new film (go see BRITTANY RUNS A MARATHON), then they dive headfirst into a nostalgia spiral. Topics...
description:
Danny welcomes Jillian Bell (star of Brittany Runs A Marathon, 22 Jump Street, Workaholics, and more) to Everything Iconic. They talk about her amazing new film (go see BRITTANY RUNS A MARATHON), then they dive headfirst into a nostalgia spiral. Topics include Sister Act 2, First Wives Club, Splash, high school theater, Jessica Simpson, NSYNC feat. Gloria Estefan, and so much more.


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
